column3: Primary cut-off time for third party
column4: Close	for	new	transactions	(for	T	+	0)	in	favour	of	third	parties,
except for bank-to-bank (MT2XX series).
SLF and SDF windows are closed for Participants at 1510 hrs.
Participants should not initiate ILF Repos after 1515 hrs.

for business, queue/Settlement processing will cease and any
transactions still in queues will be rejected by the system.
